name: Firelighter
description:
FIRELIGHTER

My entry for Ludum Dare 46 (Keep it alive) and first game with Pico-8!

You are a firelighter, keep the flame alive!

Source Code

Controls

Controller (360 Mapping):
- Analog/D-pad - Select Direction
- A or Y       - Speed Up Turn Timer
- B or X       - Select Ability

Keyboard:
- Arrow Keys   - Select Direction
- Z (or C/N)   - Speed Up Turn Timer 
- X (or V/M)   - Select Ability

Explanation:

You lose when all fires die out.

Fires can light adjacent grass on fire.

The selected ability occurs when the bars at the bottom of the screen touch. You can speed the bars up with the Speed Up Turn Timer button once you have decided what ability/direction you will use.

You can select between three abilities:

- Move: Move one square in selected direction and turn dirt into grass.
- Dash: Move as far in one direction as you can turning all grass into dirt.
- Sleep: Do nothing and pass your turn.
